task.title: How to create polka dots with wet-on-wet icing technique
task.shortdesc: Polka dots are an easy way to use the wet-on-wet icing technique.

taskbody.context: Learn how to make them by following these directions.

step.cmd: Squeeze piping bag gently to drop spots of colored icing into flooded base icing.
Release pressure on piping bag while lifting away from cookie.
